scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Presentation of Christ in the Temple. A woman in a blue robe and white veil kneels with her hands clasped in prayer. To her left stands a man with a grey beard, wearing a blue cloak and holding a basket containing doves. Behind them, a woman in a green turban and white veil looks on. To the right of the kneeling woman, a young monk in a green and white striped robe holds a bundle. On a draped table, a bishop in a golden miter and blue robe holds the Christ Child, who is swaddled in white cloth. The background features architectural elements suggesting an interior space, with draped curtains and decorative friezes.
